titleStmt.title: Dear Friends, Keep your meetings in the name of the Lord Jesus Christ, that never fell, in which you may see over all the meetings that are gathered by all the sons of Adam ...
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.

notesStmt.note: Title from first lines of text.
Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Haverford College Library.
